enhanced_description: Finix Consulting is an award-winning HR consultancy based in Bhubaneshwar, India, specializing in comprehensive recruitment solutions, training, and broader HR consulting services. They assist organizations across all industry segments in identifying and placing the right talent, promoting organizational performance and growth. Their recruitment expertise spans Executive Search & Selection, Middle Management, Frontline, and Project-Based Hiring, alongside Recruitment Process Outsourcing (RPO). Beyond talent acquisition, Finix Consulting offers corporate training, practical courses, knowledge enhancement, and skill development programs. Driven by a philosophy centered on People, Passion, and Purpose, they leverage an innovative talent strategy supported by technology to deliver swift and sure services, aiming to build capabilities and establish robust HR systems for their clients.
